mapper.sql: id, openId AS openId, productName AS productName, productPrice AS productPrice, productCount AS productCount, integral AS integral, status, createTime AS createTime
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime,'%m-%d ') AS createTime, ifnull( b.count, 0 ) AS count FROM ( SELECT curdate( ) AS createTime UNION ALL SELECT date_sub( curdate( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ) AS createTime UNION ALL SELECT date_sub( curdate( ), INTERVAL 2 DAY ) AS createTime UNION ALL SELECT date_sub( curdate( ), INTERVAL 3 DAY ) AS createTime UNION ALL SELECT date_sub( curdate( ), INTERVAL 4 DAY ) AS createTime UNION ALL SELECT date_sub( curdate( ), INTERVAL 5 DAY ) AS createTime UNION ALL SELECT date_sub( curdate( ), INTERVAL 6 DAY ) AS createTime ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT date( createTime ) AS datetime, count( * ) AS count FROM orders GROUP BY date( createTime ) ) b ON a.createTime = b.datetime ORDER BY a.createTime ASC
